title: komancho
author: komancho
content: i use crypto trading (floki and zcash) rollbit.comi make over 20k usd in my account, but my account banned permanentlyi don't abuse anything and no multiple account just trading crypto.it's scam sitehttps://i.ibb.co/XLTT1Nk/rollbit6.pnghttps://i.ibb.co/BTLchZc/rollbit7.pnghttps://i.ibb.co/P1x74dS/rollbit8.png

comments.author: Porfirii
comments.body: Quote from: komancho on May 10, 2023, 07:54:15 AMi use crypto trading (floki and zcash) rollbit.comi make over 20k usd in my account, but my account banned permanentlyi don't abuse anything and no multiple account just trading crypto.it's scam siteHey komancho,What is the reason they gave you to ban your account? I can see in one of your screenshots that they asked you to fulfil KYC: did you do it? There is no proof there that you didn't abuse their terms or your KYC was valid, and your explanation on the case is very short.Of course, 20k is an important sum of money and you must feel really angry, but to accuse a well known casino here you should provide more evidence. I hope it will be solved, but if the ban was permanent it doesn't look good.

comments.author: komancho
comments.body: Quote from: Porfirii on May 10, 2023, 08:05:10 AMQuote from: komancho on May 10, 2023, 07:54:15 AMi use crypto trading (floki and zcash) rollbit.comi make over 20k usd in my account, but my account banned permanentlyi don't abuse anything and no multiple account just trading crypto.it's scam sitehttps://i.ibb.co/XLTT1Nk/rollbit6.pnghttps://i.ibb.co/BTLchZc/rollbit7.pnghttps://i.ibb.co/P1x74dS/rollbit8.pngHey komancho,What is the reason they gave you to ban your account? I can see in one of your screenshots that they asked you to fulfil KYC: did you do it? There is no proof there that you didn't abuse their terms or your KYC was valid, and your explanation on the case is very short.Of course, 20k is an important sum of money and you must feel really angry, but to accuse a well known casino here you should provide more evidence. I hope it will be solved, but if the ban was permanent it doesn't look good.thank you for your cooperation Porfiriii try to withdraw crypto, but they request me KYC, after i finish KYC, my account banned with 20k usd i do not abuse anything and do not have multiple account.just trading crypto and make money that's all.it's scam

comments.author: Stakemeharder
comments.body: Quote from: komancho on May 10, 2023, 08:17:17 AMQuote from: Porfirii on May 10, 2023, 08:05:10 AMQuote from: komancho on May 10, 2023, 07:54:15 AMi use crypto trading (floki and zcash) rollbit.comi make over 20k usd in my account, but my account banned permanentlyi don't abuse anything and no multiple account just trading crypto.it's scam sitehttps://i.ibb.co/XLTT1Nk/rollbit6.pnghttps://i.ibb.co/BTLchZc/rollbit7.pnghttps://i.ibb.co/P1x74dS/rollbit8.pngHey komancho,What is the reason they gave you to ban your account? I can see in one of your screenshots that they asked you to fulfil KYC: did you do it? There is no proof there that you didn't abuse their terms or your KYC was valid, and your explanation on the case is very short.Of course, 20k is an important sum of money and you must feel really angry, but to accuse a well known casino here you should provide more evidence. I hope it will be solved, but if the ban was permanent it doesn't look good.thank you for your cooperation Porfiriii try to withdraw crypto, but they request me KYC, after i finish KYC, my account banned with 20k usd i do not abuse anything and do not have multiple account.just trading crypto and make money that's all.it's scam Do you have any proof that your KYC was approved? Maybe they sent you email about it? After they approved did they ban your account or was there a different trigger that occurred? My next questions would be on the crypto trading, did you use any bots or outside technology to execute trades? Some more details on this would be helpful. I see you told them you are a Korean youtuber, would you have any videos of your trades or anything to help this case out? I also have had issues with Rollbit recently banning my account for 'Sportsbook abuse' but want to look at your case as objectively as possible and get the facts first.

I also have had issues with Rollbit recently banning my account for 'Sportsbook abuse' but want to look at your case as objectively as possible and get the facts first. my KYC was approved, i can check my profile in rollbit account. (not captured)but i can't log in now.i just trading crypto, not abused.this site is just scam, if you make money you'll get banned,i do not make any youtube video about trading crypto, just will be accounce my account banned with 20k usd, (not accounce yet)

comments.author: Stakemeharder
comments.body: Can you tell us the total amount $$ you deposited into your Rollbit account?

comments.author: komancho
comments.body: Quote from: Stakemeharder on May 10, 2023, 08:51:37 AMCan you tell us the total amount $$ you deposited into your Rollbit account? 100$ usd

comments.author: Wapfika
comments.body: Mind sharing the whole chain of conversation without snipping parts of it. The evidence you provided seems incomplete because support often explain how you abused their system while of course, you will ask for a better explanation which is not available on your screenshot.I don’t know exactly how the trading on Rollbit can be abused unless they have a promotion in there that will give rewards per trade while you are using multiple account to buy and sell your own order just tomclaim the rewards without losing any money on the trade. Either way show us complete screenshot to make this accusation clear to viewer.

comments.author: komancho
comments.body: Quote from: Wapfika on May 10, 2023, 09:16:33 AMMind sharing the whole chain of conversation without snipping parts of it. Either way show us complete screenshot to make this accusation clear to viewer.this site is scam, support not explain about abuse. suppot only answer 'your account has been banned permanently for abusing our crypto trading.'that's alljust banned account i do not get any promotion reward. if you make money in rollbit, you'll be banned.

comments.author: UserU
comments.body: Besides trading, did you play their house games or at the live casino?

comments.author: komancho
comments.body: Quote from: UserU on May 10, 2023, 09:57:46 AMBesides trading, did you play their house games or at the live casino?no i only trade crypto ( floki , zcash ), no multiple account and abuse, no vpn.i don't get any reward.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: @komanchoQuoteare you rollbit member?regular trading is not allow? bullshitbanned account with 20k usd, nothing wrong?I am not a member or team member of Rollbit also I am not a fan of Rollbit. I have just posted my views not the views of the site or not on behalf of the team. I think they have banned your account only as you trading on their site and not playing on them which is their main target of them. Regular trading is allowed on the exchanger.

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Just so anyone can get a better understanding of your case, can you please upload as many evidences as you can? Spare no mercy, "flood" this thread with screenshots, it'll help us understand the whole story. Your snippets is a bit inadequate to draw a conclusion, especially with moonlight, it seems they're giving a more detailed information of the situation below the snippet of the chat you provided.Also for "trading", I understand correctly you mean as in literal trading, exchanging one crypto to another? And not a game of trade or something? Why would you even use a gambling site to trade?

comments.author: komancho
comments.body: Quote from: holydarkness on May 10, 2023, 10:39:42 AMJust so anyone can get a better understanding of your case, can you please upload as many evidences as you can? Spare no mercy, "flood" this thread with screenshots, it'll help us understand the whole story. Your snippets is a bit inadequate to draw a conclusion, especially with moonlight, it seems they're giving a more detailed information of the situation below the snippet of the chat you provided.Also for "trading", I understand correctly you mean as in literal trading, exchanging one crypto to another? And not a game of trade or something? Why would you even use a gambling site to trade?why am i using rollbit ?it has 1000x trading crypto.it is simple1.trading 1000x crypto (floki and zcash) and make money 20000$ usd2. can't withdraw money. rollbit request me KYC3. after KYC approved, try to withdraw but can't.after around 1 hour account log out automatically4. can't log in and account is banned with 20000$ usdno multiple account no abuse no rewardtrustpilot has many reviewed about rollbit scamstay away from rollbit!https://www.trustpilot.com/review/www.rollbit.comhttps://i.ibb.co/ftPpHN9/rollbit9.png

comments.author: UserU
comments.body: Quote from: komancho on May 10, 2023, 10:00:39 AMno i only trade crypto ( floki , zcash ), no multiple account and abuse, no vpn.i don't get any reward.That would likely be the cause behind the ban.Casinos generally don't like players using their sites mainly for crypto trading since that's not the original intention.

comments.author: Zwei
comments.body: Quote from: UserU on May 10, 2023, 03:54:50 PMQuote from: komancho on May 10, 2023, 10:00:39 AMno i only trade crypto ( floki , zcash ), no multiple account and abuse, no vpn.i don't get any reward.That would likely be the cause behind the ban.Casinos generally don't like players using their sites mainly for crypto trading since that's not the original intention.I think you are misunderstanding what he meant, he is not talking about crypto trading like in Binance and other exchanges, it's more like binary options but with crypto up to x1000 leverage that rollbit offers.

comments.author: Rollbit Razer
comments.body: Hey there,Thanks for allowing us to explain in further detail what happened here.As you were already told via support, your account was permanently banned from Rollbit for very obvious market manipulation. We consider this abuse of our trading feature.Conveniently, you left out your total PnL on Rollbit. Allow me to elaborate on this for the forum:Lifetime Deposits: $99.55Lifetime Withdrawals: $67,009.05Considering this, your post here is utterly ridiculous.Thanks,Razer

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Quote from: komancho on May 10, 2023, 08:58:32 AMQuote from: Stakemeharder on May 10, 2023, 08:51:37 AMCan you tell us the total amount $$ you deposited into your Rollbit account? 100$ usdQuote from: komancho on May 10, 2023, 12:00:03 PMQuote from: holydarkness on May 10, 2023, 10:39:42 AM[...] Why would you even use a gambling site to trade?why am i using rollbit ?it has 1000x trading crypto.it is simple1.trading 1000x crypto (floki and zcash) and make money 20000$ usd[...]So, just to make it clear by stating the obvious, you choose rollbit to trade instead of the conventional CEX or DEX is because they're offering 1,000x leverage? I wasn't sure I understand this feature correctly that I need to search for a back-up information from an article.Wouldn't you agree if we say that your intention is not purely good? You came to rollbit to exploit this feature to make a huge profit from a tiny amount of money.However, IMO, with that said, you're not the only one to blame. Rollbit also shared the burden and at fault here. If they're not ready for an "exploitation" of their feature and have a countermeasure placed to deter abuses, they shouldn't offer the feature on the first place.Based on Razer's reply above, you've made way so many profit, roughly 670x of your initial deposit, if my calculator is not error. Wouldn't you agree that it is way above the word "enough"? Quote from: Rollbit Razer on May 10, 2023, 07:11:06 PM[...]As you were already told via support, your account was permanently banned from Rollbit for very obvious market manipulation. We consider this abuse of our trading feature.[...]Just like other case --the other one, not the one with video conference-- can you please give a better explanation on what kind of market manipulation and abuse OP did?If I may give a suggestion and be blunt about it, if you're not ready for a feature with all things and security placed, don't offer it and then kicking your user(s) out because they put your book in red.

comments.author: ImThour
comments.body: Quote from: Rollbit Razer on May 10, 2023, 07:11:06 PMAs you were already told via support, your account was permanently banned from Rollbit for very obvious market manipulation. We consider this abuse of our trading feature.Can you briefly explain what sort of Market manipulation he did? If he got the skill to trade and make money from $100 to $67k, that's not a reason to ban a user.If there is a valid proof of him manipulating the market, I am sure you would love to share here with everyone.
